name: PotatoBoy: Cursed Island
description:
[🥔] PotatoBoy : Cursed Island v0.0.1 Made for Opera GX #NoticeMe Game Jam : "Then The Night Changed Everything"

PotatoBoy has been sent to a mysterious island to study the phenomena that occur there, such as abnormally rapid growth and transformation at night. To carry out the research you must feed the animals with what you find around so that it reproduces, generate as many animals as possible and you will be greatly rewarded with SCORE, be careful of the night because it corrupts the animals and in this state you could hurt yourself or lose animals at sunrise because of their new form, fortunately there are these large luminous orbs which seem to be able to purify them, they only need a good big shock to get themselves activate !

[⌨️] Keyboard controls
  • WASD - Move
  • SPACE - Jump & Confirm
  • SHIFT - Dash
  • F2 - Secret Setting
[🎮] Gamepad controls
  • DPAD - Move
  • (A) - Jump & Confirm
  • (B) - Dash
[🕹️] How To Score
  • During the day collect as much food as possible and try to feed each animal once. (Day and night last 1 minute each)
  • During the night pick up the luminous orbs to purify the animals, the orbs absorb damage received then explode by purifying the surrounding animals so be sure to group the enemies and jump into the pile to get as many as possible at once ! (Unpurified animals will disappear at daybreak)
  • Bonus points can be obtained if you manage to have at least 10 animals of each when the game ends (+2500 points)
  • Bonus points can be obtained each time you manage to use all the food that has grown during the day (+1000 points)
  • The game ends when you have no more life, so be sure to jump and dash a lot (The dash does not make you invulnerable but combining with the jump allows you to dodge better), also beware of the water at night because staying there for a few seconds could be fatal ! (The fish bite!)
